channel.title: Hamachi connection help
channel.description:
HI guys I was just wondering If anyone could tell me how to make it so I can make it so people can connect to my server via hamachi I've tried every single tutorial and nothing worked so Could someone please give me a detailed tut or team view me.
If wishing to team view me contact me on mymsn.
msn: chopsythe@live.com

item.title: Hamachi connection help
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“lol0, post:7, topic:451988”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=554869.msg4063756#msg4063756 date=1343679300]

Don’t use hamachi, just portforward.

cause I want to use hamachi for private server hosting

no one will join your server if you use hamachi.
[/quote]

it’s not for pub use atm its for private use me and my friends only.[/quote]
Portforward get it over with LOL.

Read full topic
